channel.title: NPCHandler
channel.description:
When im trying to do some tutorials In NPCHandler.Java it tells me to search for moo. My NPCHandler.Java Doesnt Have moo So where do i put it. Thanks Help
What else can i search for
Btw heres my NPCHandler.Java if u wanna have a look

item.title: NPCHandler
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

Search for

if (npcs[i].RandomWalk == true) { npcs[i].getNextNPCMovement();p
instead.
Under it, use this BASE to make dialouges.

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) { if (misc.random2(SPEED) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "TEXT HERE"; } }

Read full topic
